comment: The latest release crashes on open on my Nexus 5X. Otherwise I absolutely love the design and get many compliments on it. Will donate as soon as I can open the application. And also rate a 5 after it works again. Thanks! = ) update: uninstalled old version and reinstalled and it now works. Hope that helps others with issue.
title: New Version Crashing on Open

author: regis loumont
comment: nice & neat watch face. lots of settings to adapt it to your taste. when I bought my smartwatch I first thought I would setup a real expensive looking face. but what is the point. this is new technology and this face suits it better. nice work. please donate to the guy! :-)
title: favorite face

author: Gavin Cowie
comment: I had a watch face like this with stock wear 1.5, the darn thing disappeared in 2.0! This is a close enough facsimile, and I get to tweak the colors, which is nice.

author: Jack Shattock
comment: The watch face is great however the most recent update causes it to crash of my htc one m8.
title: Great but new update crashes

author: Nestor
comment: A SPLENDID WATCH FACE.  It's greatly appreciated that you finally included the option to make the text bigger. I can now easily read the time. You've earned all five 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 for the most beautiful watch face. Keep up the good work!
title: Venera

author: Hockeyguyman
comment: Superbly simple. not just in its design but also in the customizable options interface
title: Simple but great, please donate

author: Ipk Altaf
comment: Not working on my Samsung Galaxy Note Edge android 6.0.1 :(
title: Not working

author: Charlie Brown
comment: I love that ambient mode can be set to keep the colors.
title: Great watch face

author: Kyle Hollinsworth
comment: Love it
title: Thanks

author: mufaddal tapia
comment: Fantastic

author: Jason Howell
comment: It's a well designed watch face, exactly what I wanted. The problem for me is the color picker in the settings. It's all touch based, which makes it impossible to pick an exact color.
title: Great watch face held back by the settings menu.

author: LaDonna Wann
comment: I love this watch face. Once you get to know what the dials look like for corresponding hours and mins you don't even need the embedded numbers. Ppl think you're looking at options and are confused when you give them the time. :) haha I would however, like to see more color combination preset. Thanks!
title: Go to  watch face!!

author: Matthew Bird
comment: A great watch face, one of the best around however sync between settings and the watch is rather hit or miss, changing the profile and grayscale on ambient especially..
title: Great!

author: Michael Delaney
comment: People stop me and ask me about my watch all the time because of this watch face. Is that an Apple watch, they say...
title: Simple and eye catching

author: Nicola Scotti di Uccio
comment: I've searched a lot for a watch face that looked beautiful and useful at the same time. Now I found what I was looking for!

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Glad to hear you love the watch face!

title: Greatest watch face

author: William McMullen
comment: Love the concept of the watch, and I think it's georgous. But I can't seem to get the Wear app to detect that its installed on this phone, so I can't use it on my watch. Any ideas?  Edit: Thanks for the fix! Great dev.

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Thanks for finding this, I just pushed out an update that should fix it!

author: phil ledford
comment: For some reason it's not showing up on my android wear app. Can't install it on my moto 360. Any help?

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Thanks for finding this, I just pushed out an update that should fix it!

author: Adam Bugno
comment: Great looking face! Although for some reason I am unable to change settings. They appear different on the app but do not update on the watch. It is connected. Is there a solution to this?

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Adam, the only time I've seen this happen is when the watch face isn't installed yet. Only thing I can suggest is rebooting both devices and then toggling settings off and on. If that doesn't work, please let me know at miles(dot)oberstadt(at)gmail.com

author: Ashofor Stanley
comment: Have had to uninstall and reinstall twice yet no watch face on watch or in android wear.
title: Not working with GWR

author: Ryan Campione
comment: Great Minimalist Design

author: Darnell Graham
comment: One of my favorite watch faces but with last update second dial only ticks, no more smoothing. I know it's minor but I really liked it.

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Thanks for the rating! What kind of watch do you have? It's still working on my Moto 360, you might have to uninstall the app and reinstall it. Feel free to contact me at miles(dot)oberstadt(at)gmail.com

title: Cool watch face

author: Jon Santos
comment: I like it!
title: Cool!

author: E. B.
comment: Could it be? Why is it so hard to find a watch face that displays the seconds with a number, always? :-o This does it whenever looking at the watch.
title: Wow, the only watch face that always shows seconds?

author: Ian Tilley
comment: Simple, different design and it works well. A Watchface I am very happy to show off on my Moto 360. I agree that dimmed mode would be better in grey tones and maybe you should consider an in-app purchase for those who are happy to donate something...
title: Great

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: So cool that the individual ring colors can be changed to my liking.
title: Cool

author: Ian McCall
comment: Very nice

author: Vani Monkeybear
comment: Especially since you can set it any colors you want! Dimmed version needs work though, I'd suggest the 'seconds' ring to disappear or freeze to help save battery life. And personally I'd also prefer the other rings to turn gray when dimmed

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, I didn't notice that this happens with the watch in Ambient Mode! You're right, the seconds hand looks really weird like that, no reason to have that visible in Ambient Mode, I'll fix that in upcoming release. I'll look into a black and white version for Ambient Mode, I hope I can get that done too.

title: Beautiful

author: Don C
comment: Please add the option to change the colors. Maybe even make a gradient option. The moto 360 could benefit from some subtle design changes, to compensate for the " cut out" at the bottom. The alignment on the moto 360 for the numbers,  is slightly off, or just look that way.

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Thanks for the review! I'm looking into adding more color schemes as well as a custom one for people to make their own. Gradients might take more time, but it's a great suggestion, I'll look into it! I aligned the numbers at a 45 degree angle (I liked the look), I'm working on making that changeable in the next version.

title: Wish I could change the colors.

author: Andrew Watson
comment: Great watch face. Just what you would hope it would be! My feature request: ability to turn off the numbers. It's a pretty and functional enough face to not need them!

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Thanks for the review! I didn't even think of adding an option to disable the numbers on the watch, I'll build that into the next version!

title: Currently my watch face!

author: Mara Schmidt
comment: Works awesome! Interface is smooth, very "futuristic "

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Thanks for the review, glad you like it!

title: Seamless!

author: Daniel McGee
comment: It never showed up on my 360 I know they can take awhile sometimes, but I waited 24 hrs and never saw it. I'll try again and update if it ever installs

reply.author: Miles Oberstadt
reply.content: Sorry for the late response, if you'd consider trying it again, with some phones you need to open the companion app on your phone, change a setting, and see if it goes over.

title: Looks cool.... But

author: Joel Gonzalez
comment: I don't know if I'm blind or stupid or both but I could not for the life of me figure out how to sync the settings.
title: Settings sync?

comment: The "flat tire" on the moto 360 is very apparent when this watch face gets to 6 o'clock.  Not for me.
title: Eh

author: Ashish Gupta
comment: Good
